newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Turbo offers HK$0.63/shr for Dickson Con.
newsitem.headline: Turbo offers HK$0.63/shr for Dickson Con.

text.p: Turbo Act International Ltd said on Monday it will make an offer of HK$0.63 per share for all outstanding shares of construction and civil engineering group Dickson Construction International Ltd.

The company said in a statement that Dickson Construction chairman Ho Kee Kung had agreed to sell his entire stake in the company, representing about 20.63 percent of the issued shares, at HK$0.63 each to Turbo Act.

Turbo Act said its Dickson Construction stake, together with that of all related parties, would rise to about 46.02 percent from 25.39 percent after the sale agreement and it would subsequently make an offer for the remaining shares.
Turbo Act is 60 percent owned by Broadata Ltd and 40 percent by Shopmart Ltd.
